content:
Hello!
Yesterday, in an attempt to bring full nll closer to stabilization, I opened https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/76104 to put mutable_borrow_reservation_conflict lint in deny mode by default and I wonder if we should open a crater run?
Since the queue has already 4/5 jobs, it won't be started before another ~1.5week which hopefully should be enough time to review.
